plot: The neighborhoods of a quiet city. Traversing a wasteland Pierre looks for the memory of his father, missing as war photographer, and opens his horizons. With unusual parameters the film tempts to open a direct access to the Sensitive.
title: À travers les branches d'un arbre
plot_es: The neighborhoods of a quiet city. Traversing a wasteland Pierre looks for the memory of his father, missing as war photographer, and opens his horizons. With unusual parameters the film tempts to open a direct access to the Sensitive.
